ing: 2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix
des: "Fresh vegetable soup that is said to burn off calories by just eating it.  It's one of my favorite veggie soups.  "
ins: In a large pot, combine celery, cabbage, bell pepper, zucchini, onions and tomatoes.  Pour in enough water to cover by one inch.  Stir in onion soup mix, garlic, peppercorns and bay leaf.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 90 minutes to 2 hours, until vegetables are tender and flavors are well blended.
